text: Valeriu È˜tefan Zgonea (b. 3 September 1967, Craiova) is a Romanian politician. He was the President of the Chamber of Deputies of Romania from 2012 through 2016. == Politics == He is member of PDSR in 30 April 1996. From 2001 he is vice prime minister of P.S.D. . Category:1967 births Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Romania) Category:Living people
title: Valeriu Zgonea
